item.title: Custom cluster
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: RAFT Architecture multiple master nodes multiple api server: load balancer multiple control planes: RAFT multiple etcd: same on control plane or dedicated machines One master node and 2 worker nodes kubeadm terraform ansible (or vagrant) 2 master nodes, 2 worker nodes and 1 load balancer openshift cluster
